posts.post_title: SOLD - 1909 Wheeling Team PC w/ Bill McKechnie
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a 1909 Wheeling Stogies Team Postcard featuring HOFer Bill McKechnie.

Offering it here on Net54 before offering it on eBay.  PM or email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url].

$XX OBO (paypal f/f preferred)
